challenges.title: Yield Farming Calculator
challenges.description: Calculate APY for different DeFi strategies

problem.scenario: You want to provide liquidity to a Uniswap ETH/USDC pool
givens: Additional LP rewards: 8% APY in pool tokens
problem.question: What is your total expected return after 1 year, assuming no impermanent loss?

educational.title: DeFi Yield Farming Explained
educational.explanation: Yield farming involves providing liquidity to DeFi protocols in exchange for rewards. Understanding the math behind APY calculations is crucial for making informed investment decisions.
keyPoints: APY accounts for compound interest over a year
DeFi yields often come from multiple sources
Impermanent loss can affect overall returns
Higher yields typically mean higher risks

detailedLearning.whatYourelearning: How to calculate and evaluate DeFi investment returns while understanding the associated risks.

Liquidity Provision.definition: Depositing tokens into a liquidity pool to facilitate trading
Liquidity Provision.purpose: Enables decentralized trading and earns fees for providers

APY Calculation.explanation: Accounts for compounding effects over time

Impermanent Loss.definition: Loss compared to holding tokens separately due to price changes
Impermanent Loss.calculation: Based on the ratio of token price changes
Impermanent Loss.mitigation: Choosing correlated pairs or stablecoin pairs

riskConsiderations: Impermanent loss from token price divergence
Liquidity mining rewards may decrease over time
